title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Managing Graduate-Level Educational Complexity Using Damping-Amplification Metaphors

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and language education experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will develop the ability to systematically analyze the complexity of graduate-level educational programs by applying the attenuation-amplification metaphor
Learners will be able to propose three or more strategies for designing personalized learning pathways
Learners will perform tasks reconstructing actual classroom scenarios using complexity management tools within language education contexts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
